author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

In the same spirit of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29198 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35782, in case the DCS status from SCAL is not available, fall back to `DCSRecord` data provided by the software FED n. 1022. The logic is modified in the class `GenericTriggerEventFlag` which is used in several DQM clients.  
No differences are expected in Run1 and Run2 workflows. For Run3 data the selector should now work correctly.

#### PR validation:

Run successfully `runTheMatrix.py -l imited --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: migration to `DCSRecord` of `GenericTriggerEventFlag`
